title: Albumin-dNLR score could be an etiological criterion to determine inflammation burden for GLIM in medical inpatients over 70 years old: A multicenter retrospective study
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Jingyong Xu, Yifu Hu, Lijuan Wang, Pengxue Li, Mingwei Zhu, Jinghai Song, Junmin Wei
